forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms between 2am and 4am, then showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 64, with temperatures rising to around 66 overnight. South southwest wind 20 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 45 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 1pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 1pm and 2pm. Partly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 15 to 30 mph, with gusts as high as 50 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As the clock ticks into the early hours of the morning in Evanston, a palpable sense of moisture hangs in the air, heralding the likelihood of showers and thunderstorms. The sky is shrouded in heavy cloud cover, with the temperature lingering at a comfortable 64 degrees, expected to climb slightly as the night progresses. A brisk south-southwest wind, gusting dramatically at times, creates a restless energy along the shoreline, hinting at tumultuous conditions in the waters nearby.

Thursday promises to be a day of fleeting sunshine shattered by persistent rain. The morning will see a continuation of showers and thunderstorms, likely tapering off by early afternoon, but not before bringing additional rainfall of up to half an inch. As temperatures drop to around 56 later in the day, the air will feel quite different, inviting thick layers for comfort. Given the aggressive winds—a mix of gusty beginnings and later calmness—dress warmly, perhaps in a waterproof jacket, while sturdy shoes may help navigate the slick pavement. With a combination of rain-soaked landscapes and riled waters, the beach is best viewed from a distance today, but finding shelter to unwind with a good book or enjoying a warm beverage at a local café could provide a perfect opportunity to savor this dreary but contemplative weather.
